pepperoni: Made by pepperoni, a American variety of salami, made from a cured mixture of pork and beef seasoned with paprika or other chili pepper.
margherita: A typical Neapolitan pizza, made with San Marzano tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, salt and extra-virgin olive oil.
vegetarian: A pizza made only by vegetables: extremely healthy!!
neapolitan: a style of pizza made with tomatoes and mozzarella cheese. It must be made with either San Marzano tomatoes or Pomodorino del Piennolo del Vesuvio
Hawaiian: Pineapple might not be the first thing that comes to mind when you think pizza.But add in some ham and it creates an unexpectedly solid sweet and salty combination for this type of pizza.
